title: Congressman Richard Neal on Tax Reform (Audio)
itunes:title: Congressman Richard Neal on Tax Reform (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. (Carol Solo)\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010Richard E Neal\u0010Massachusetts Congressman (D)\u0010(US)House of Representatives\u0010Rep. Richard Neal (D-MA), House Ways and Means Committee Ranking Member joins Bloomberg Radio at 3:15. We call his office at  413.785.0325. Topic: Tax reform

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
